org.eclipse.scada.configuration.world.osgi

Interface Item

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbsoluteDanglingReference, AverageItem, ComponentDanglingReference, ConstantItem, DanglingItemReference, FormulaItem, GlobalSummaryItem, ImportItem, MovingAverageItem, PersistentItem, ProxyItem, ReferenceItem, ScriptItem, SourceItem, SummaryItem, WeakReferenceDataSourceItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteDanglingReferenceImpl, AverageItemImpl, ComponentDanglingReferenceImpl, ConstantItemImpl, DanglingItemReferenceImpl, FormulaItemImpl, GlobalSummaryItemImpl, ImportItemImpl, ItemImpl, MovingAverageItemImpl, PersistentItemImpl, ProxyItemImpl, ReferenceItemImpl, ScriptItemImpl, SourceItemImpl, SummaryItemImpl, WeakReferenceDataSourceItemImpl

    public interface Item
    A representation of the model object 'Item'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Name
    • Information
    • Item Features

    See Also:
    OsgiPackage.getItem()

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Returns the value of the 'Name' attribute.

      Sets the value of the 'Information' containment reference.

      Sets the value of the 'Name' attribute.

      • getItemFeatures

         getItemFeatures()
        Returns the value of the 'Item Features' containment reference list. The list contents are of type ItemFeatureEntry. It is bidirectional and its opposite is 'Item'.

        If the meaning of the 'Item Features' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Item Features' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        OsgiPackage.getItem_ItemFeatures(), ItemFeatureEntry.getItem()
